vegetables.title: Tomato
vegetables.description: A juicy red fruit often used in salads and cooking.

vegetables.title: Onion
vegetables.description: A bulb vegetable with a pungent flavor used in various cuisines.

vegetables.title: Potato
vegetables.description: A starchy tuberous crop widely consumed worldwide.

vegetables.title: Green Chilli
vegetables.description: A spicy pepper used to add heat to dishes.

vegetables.title: Red Chilli
vegetables.description: Another variety of spicy pepper commonly used in cooking.

vegetables.title: Curry Leaves
vegetables.description: Aromatic leaves used in Indian cooking to add flavor.

vegetables.title: Capsicum
vegetables.description: Also known as bell pepper, available in various colors and used in salads and cooking.

cashCrops.description: A soft, fluffy fiber used to make textiles.

cashCrops.description: A legume crop rich in protein and used in various food products.

cashCrops.title: Tur
cashCrops.description: A type of pulse crop commonly used in Indian cuisine.

cashCrops.title: Jowar
cashCrops.description: A gluten-free grain used as a staple food in many parts of India.

cashCrops.title: Chana
cashCrops.description: Also known as chickpea, used in various dishes and as a snack.

fruits.title: Mango
fruits.description: A tropical fruit known for its sweet and tangy flavor.

fruits.title: Chikoo (Sapota)
fruits.description: A sweet and grainy-textured fruit popular in tropical regions.

fruits.title: Custard Apple
fruits.description: A creamy and delicious fruit with a unique flavor.

fruits.title: Guava
fruits.description: A tropical fruit rich in vitamin C and antioxidants.

fruits.title: Lemon
fruits.description: A citrus fruit used for its juice and zest in cooking.

fruits.title: Orange
